Subject: No support for isHead() in CrawlURI
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=235334126; y=gmmx5QtqfzxFASaa19S_W1PHSdAXYmOOtxjlS4sK3Ce9Iq0M8A
X-Yahoo-Profile: prasen_aol

It seems that we are supporting only GET/POST HTTP protocols  in 
FetchHTTP. There could be some valid cases (e.g. for HUGE files)  where 
you may not want to download the whole file, and do just a validity 
check by doing HTTP HEAD. Any plans to get that fix  in FecthHTTP ?

I have made that change  locally, but it would be nice to have that get 
done in Heritrix itself.

prasen
